Join GPCC & ASA!
Counseling the Exiting Student Webex
The Graduate and Professional Concerns Committee of MASFAA and National FFELP guarantor American Student Assistance® has partnered to offer a webex on Counseling the Exiting Student.
Date and Time:
Tuesday February, 26, 2008 12:30 p.m. to 2:00 p.m. EST
Course Description:
Please join us to discuss important issues surrounding the exit interview process. Discussion points will include:
An overview of federal FFELP and Direct Loan exit counseling requirements Should students consolidate? If yes, why? What’s the difference between ICR and IBR repayment options? How to effectively explain the Loan Forgiveness Program and Teach Grant programs to your students A question and answer period will follow.
Who Should Attend
Any financial aid administrator interested in discussing the topic of Counseling the Exiting Student.
How to attend the webex on February 26, 2008
For the computer portion of the webex go to the below website: https://amsa.webex.com/amsa/onstage/g.php?d=484653467&t=a
Follow instructions to make sure your computer has the appropriate platers to view UCF rich media files.
